section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:addSouvenirAdminWindow
Class initializes AdminWindow UI and manages all Admin only permissive execution in editing user database, college database, souv database, etc confirmPage
Class sets breifs user on confirmation on trip planning actions confirmpageDbManager
SQL Database Manager class LoginWindowloginWindow
Class sets ui and manages execution for validating username and password tripPlanner
Class recusively planning (calculating) the most efficient trip, manages data tables, checks if data is valid, and begins inital processes of planning a trip tripprogress
Class for displaying and calculating student trip progress, destinations, and student shopping cart for souverniers tripSummary
Class for generating and updating sql data from read DB and overall planned trip summary
